Essayes or rather, Encomions prayses of sadnesse: and of the emperour Iulian the Apostata. By Sir William Cornewallis, the younger knight. Cornwallis, William, Sir, d. 1631?
[72] p.
Printed by George Purslowe, for Richard Hawkins, and are to be sold at his shop in Chauncery lane, neere Seriants Inne, At London : 1616.
Signatures: A² B-I⁴ K² . Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
